channel.title: Help my only i can acess my server
channel.description:
hi im saying this because only i can acess my server my friends have put in the ip and they cant connect, i have diabled all of my firewalls, my friends still cant connect.
I run my server by using the runserver.bat file (is this right) please help me i would very much apreiciate it
Pm me of post thread
Thanks ;)

item.title: Help my only i can acess my server
item.dc:creator: @v3n0m4 v3n0m4
item.description:
@v3n0m4 wrote:

Yes you run it using runserver.bat but you need to have either no-ip or hamachi for your friends to connect to your server.

Read full topic
item.source: Help my only i can acess my server
